Raw example -  Horizontal creasing no pin holes etc. Two small areas of paper loss on front Back appears to have some eraser marks as original owner looks to have used as a checklist.

$335 includes fully insured priority mail shipping   *** SOLD

If no takers, I will periodically drop price. I recently upgraded for my Collection so this one needs a new home.

Please claim in remarks or PM me to claim.
